document_data.caption: ''An image of Highcliff Castle.''
document_data.name: Highcliff Castle
document_data.mainbody: '''Highcliff Castle''' was a ruin in [[Highcliff]] on the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.Geography: Located on a hill near Highcliff, Highcliff Castle was a strategic point.
document_data.Inhabitants: The inhabitants all died, with only the [[undead]] remaining.
document_data.History:
One of many sites where the [[King of Shadows]]' army fought a battle, Highcliff Castle was a ruin by [[1374 DR]]. However, at that time, a shadow priest came and began raising an undead army. Fortunately, he was stopped by the [[Kalach-Cha]].

In the area around the castle at the time, the adventurers [[Alex]] and [[Andrew]], as well as [[William]] (who ran away from his [[Juni|wife]]), were threatened by [[wolf|wolves]]. The Kalach-Cha could rescue them.
